data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Mahesana that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mahesana, Gujarat, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 22,386 believers in Mahesana and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Mahesana, Gujarat, India.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Mahesana.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Mahesana, Gujarat, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Dangashia people might believe through him.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Mahesana, Gujarat, India not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, move the 22,386 believers in the county of Mahesana to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.section_summary:
the county of Mahesana, Gujarat, India has a population of 2,035,100.

We estimate Mahesana has 22,386 people who might know Jesus, 24,692 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,988,021 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Mahesana who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
